item.title: The most dangerous intersection in Barcelona
item.description:
The most dangerous intersection in Barcelona

You guessed it: Avinguda Diagonal and Passeig de Gracia.

From 2010 to 2014, there were 129 accidents involving 165 victims and 248 vehicles! That's an average of one accident every two weeks.

Yikes.

But everywhere is kind of dangerous

The reality is that, relative to other comparable cities, Barcelona is a dangerous place. Sure, Rome is worse (who's surprised?), but xxx, yyy and zzz have half the rate of accidents, and 1/4 the rate of fatalities (need to put something here). And it doesn't appear to be getting any better.

What's behind all these crashes?

Blame Messi?
